title: cmd/gc: runtime assertE2T, assertI2T write 1 byte for 0-byte result
body:
This test case http://play.golang.org/p/vpGI3X22jR should print "PASS".  With

go version go1.3beta2 +5bf1a8b3aeea Thu May 29 13:47:31 2014 -0400 linux/amd64

it prints "FAIL".

The deferred function in matchComments appears to be miscompiled.
